name: First Lieutenant Spacey
text: Your Turn Once Per Turn: When one of your life cards is put into your hand this character gets +2000 this turn.

effect.text: When one of your life cards is put into your hand this character gets +2000 this turn.

meta.notes: Card has 'SAMPLE' watermark, but this is not a real card. All fields are inferred from the visible text and layout.
